Question: Gorilla was followed in 1976 by In the Pocket, this person's last studio album to be released under Warner Bros.
Hints: Flanked by two greatest hit releases, this person's Platinum-certified October Road appeared in 2002 to a receptive audience.
The album's title was this person's answer, and Simon asked for divorce.
This person's four siblings—Alex, Livingston, Hugh, and Kate—have also been musicians with recorded albums.
